name: Dr.Loop's Final Run
description:
A small puzzle game made within 72 hours, Dr.Loop just can't catch a break. The  lab is a maze, can you help her have a fun day off!

Ludum Dare : Game Jam : #47

Movement >> Left and Right

Jump >> Space

Helpful hints: There is a secret in the Falling Crate Room (use the crate on the left side), I hope you can escape your work and have fun =)

~~~~~~~~~!@# Bugs #@!~~~~~~~~

- When you reach the end the button doesn't work (hierarchy order) {Only in Web Build}

- Jumping vertical + movement will cause you to not jump as high
